articles.description: HDFC Bank Share Price Target 2024: Shares of India's largest private sector bank marched northward on the bourses on Friday and ended the week's last trading session with gains. Brokerage firm Kotak Institutional Equities remains bullish on private sector ban…
articles.content:
HDFC Bank stock was quoted at its 52-week high of Rs 1,757.80 on the BSE on July 3, 2023, while it was seen at its 52-week low of Rs 1,363.45 on February 14, 2024.
(Image: istock/ET Now News)

articles.title: Anand Mahindra offers job to UP teen who saved toddler from monkey attack using Alexa. See post - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Anand Mahindra shared a post on X in which he praised Nikita and described her thinking as 'extraordinary'. He also offered a job to the teen at the Mahindra Group if she ever decided to work in the corporate world.
articles.content: On Saturday, a 13-year-old girl named Nikita earned praise from all sections of the internet for her presence of mind. The teen was visiting her sisters house in Uttar Pradeshs Basti when monkeys ent… [+2036 chars]

articles.title: Video: Passenger Gets Broken Window Seat On Air India Flight, Airline Responds - NDTV
articles.description: The incident happened on April 4 when the passenger noticed the broken seat, following which the airline enlisted the help of an engineer.
articles.content:
The engineer could not fix the broken seat, the passenger claimed.
